amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt regulations promulgated to maintain or support U.S. financial stability or prevent or reduce systemic risk.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 115-3 to exempt regulations promulgated to maintain or support U.S. financial stability or prevent or reduce systemic risk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 232 (Roll no. 47).

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
